title: Hundreds Of Unmarked Graves Found At Another Indigenous School In Canada
content:
1. Hundreds Of Unmarked Graves Found At Another Indigenous School In Canada  NPR
  2. Hundreds of unmarked graves discovered at a former residential school in Canada, officials say  CNN
  3. Alberta pledges 8M to help First Nations locate and honour graves at residential schools  Global News
  4. Canada should use DNA testing to return children in residential school graves to family members  The Globe and Mail
  5. John Ivison: O’Toole’s pro-Canada speech may resonate with voters tired of apologies  National Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
